column4: Apple could use Brooklyn case to pursue details about FBI iPhone hack: source

column4: Fitch Rates Wyndham's Sr. Unsecured Term Loan 'BBB-'
column5: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  March 30 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB-' rating to Wyndham  Worldwide Corporation's (WYN) $325 million senior unsecured term loan. The term  loan ranks pari passu with existing unsecured debt and matures March 24  2021. A  full list of ratings is provided at the end of this release. Fitch expects the transaction to be leverage-neutral as proceeds of the term  loan  in part  were used to redeem $315 million of outst

column5: * Receives orphan drug designation from FDA for Iomab-B in treating refractory and relapsed acute myeloid leukemia in elderly patients
